core

Class Qubit

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Complex
      • core.Matrix
        • core.Qubit

  • public class Qubit
extends Matrix
    The Qubit class represents a linear superposition of states

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Qubit()
      Constructor for a Qubit, which is a 2x1 matrix
      Qubit(Complex a, Complex b)
      Sets the Qubit using two complex numbers
      Qubit(Matrix m)
      Constructs a Qubit using a 2x1 matrix
      Qubit(State s)
      Constructs a Qubit using a state

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Complex get0()
      Gets the first complex number of the Qubit
      Complex get1()
      Gets the second complex number of the Qubit
      double getMagnitude()
      Gets the magnitude of the Qubit
      Matrix getMatrix()
      Gets the matrix representing the Qubit
      void normalise()
      normalise() manipulates the current qubit coefficients and ensures they are normalised.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts a Qubit to a string representation

    • Method Detail

      • getMatrix

        public Matrix getMatrix()
        Gets the matrix representing the Qubit
        Returns:
        the matrix of the Qubit

      • normalise

        public void normalise()
        normalise() manipulates the current qubit coefficients and ensures they are normalised. If the qubits are already normalised then they are not affected by this.
